name: long_stats_tps
description: Stack results for individual time points based on longitudinal qdec table.

inputs.description: qdec.table.dat file with first columns: fsid  fsid-base
inputs.name: QDEC Table File

inputs.description: Stats file without path: e.g. aseg.stats or lh.aparc.stats
inputs.name: Stats File

inputs.description: Stats measure, e.g. volume, thickness, mean, std
inputs.name: Stats Measure

inputs.description: Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory
inputs.name: Subjects Directory

inputs.description: Select a column from the qdec table itself (then --stats, --meas and --sd are not necessary)
inputs.name: QDEC Table Column

inputs.description: Use cross sectional results (for testing only)
inputs.name: Cross Sectional Flag

output-files.description: File containing stacked results for individual time points.
output-files.name: Stacked Results File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
